name: hpa starter baseline beginner
full_name: h1 Importing Libraries h1 BASIC EDA h1 LOADING THE DATASET h1 Define the model h1 TRAINING THE MODEL h1 Next step is try out with image augmentation
description: Given images of cells from our microscopes and labels of protein location assigned together for all cells in the image We will develop models capable of segmenting and classifying each individual cell with precise labels. Importing Libraries BASIC EDA LOADING THE DATASET Define the model TRAINING THE MODEL Scores are not that high we need to try out various techniques to improve the score. Notebooks referred to create this kernel are given the comment of this notebook. Next step is try out with image augmentation Work under progress Plot the value counts for each count Split the labels Create a counter. Human Protein Atlas Single Cell Classification competition This is a weakly supervised multi label classification problem. This starter notebook to get an idea on how to approach this competition. If this helped give an upvote. This initializes the count for each class with a value of zero Update the counter Plot.
script: Flatten keras.layers create_train GlobalAveragePooling2D tensorflow.keras.callbacks EarlyStopping Dropout tensorflow.keras.models Adam defaultdict Conv2D collections seaborn numpy models tensorflow.keras.applications InceptionV3 make_model ReduceLROnPlateau Input load_image ModelCheckpoint sklearn.model_selection matplotlib.pyplot Dense tensorflow pandas keras.optimizers tensorflow.keras Counter tqdm BatchNormalization Model layers MaxPooling2D train_test_split
